ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 108
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Finally there is true and FACTUAL confirmation that these items do exist. It is now just a matter of time before the info is commonplace.  Gee, I remember
ygData.messageBody:
>*picks jaw up off the floor*
>
>Whoever "Anonymous" is needs to be shot, hung, dragged through broken
>glass,
>then shot a few more times.

Finally there is true and FACTUAL confirmation that these items do exist.
It is now just a matter of time before the info is commonplace. Gee, I
remember crafted armor being pretty rare and no one knew how to do it. Now,
every warrior and their cousin wears the stuff, running around like
varying-sized blueberries.

I wouldn't blame "Anonymous" for withholding information. How often do you
discover something and immediately share it with every Tom, Dick, and Harry
that comes along?
